Things About Me

BIO

Hello, I am Isha Mehta. A computer science undergraduate student ,building up myself to face the challenges in the tech world. A self-motivated, inquisitive, tech enthusiast who is everyday learning some technologies to vividly apply them. As being always zealous about Competitve Programming and technologies, I love to practically implement them. Currently I am looking for a position to apply all my tech skills positively towards an organization and learn some new ones.
